numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Most players are people of color.
2. Few coaches are people of color.
3. I wonder what stops these women from becoming coaches after their sporting careers.
4. I wonder if many people who pay for these sports do not want people of color to be in charge.
6. In my community, I see representation of myself.
7. However, there is not enough representation of coaches who are people of color.
8. This graph shows disparities in sports leagues.
9. The disparities concern people of color in higher positions.
10. The headline is: Women of Color Need More Representation High Up in Sports Leagues.
